mapper.sql: SELECT t.copyright_id, t.title, t.introduction, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.certificate, t.cost, t.application_form, t.origin_file, t.agreement, t.cost, t.invoice, t.item_id, t.state, t.reimbursement, GROUP_CONCAT(m.user_id) userId , GROUP_CONCAT(m.state) user_state, i.title FROM t_copyright t LEFT JOIN t_members m ON (t.copyright_id=m.task_id) LEFT JOIN t_items i ON (i.items_id=t.item_id) where 1=1
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT t.copyright_id ,t.title,t.introduction,t.start_time,t.end_time,t.certificate,t.application_form,t.origin_file, t.agreement,t.cost,t.invoice,t.item_id,t.state,t.reimbursement,i.title AS item_title from t_copyright t LEFT JOIN t_items i on t.item_id = i.items_id
where 1=1
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{copyright.title},'%')
AND state = #{copyright.state}
AND reimbursement =#{copyright.reimbursement}
start_time >= '${item}'
start_time <= '${item}'
end_time >= '${item}'
end_time <= '${item}'
AND u.full_name like CONCAT('%',#{copyright.fullName},'%')
